bibl.title: Temples of the Last Pharaohs.
bibl.note: nombr. figg., plans et pll. n./bl. et coul., 2 cartes coul. h. t.
Voir en part. pp. 143-224: Part I, 7. The Ptolemaic Period (323-31 B.C.); - 225-273: 8. The Roman Period (31 B.C.-A.D. 385); - 315-324: List of Late Period Temples.
ARNOLD Dieter, Temples of the Last Pharaohs.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 1999, 4°, viii-373 pp., nombr. figg., plans et pll. n./bl. et coul., 2 cartes coul. h. t. ISBN 0-19-512633-5. £34.
